body_html: @yaroslavvb I'm not exactly sure how is your benchmark related to my problem. I think my problem is that the SyncReplicasOptimizer itself gives a significant overhead, and it is not the communication overhead. Anyway, it was a few months ago, so let me test it again with the recent version of TensorFlow as @tatatodd suggested.

body: @yaroslavvb I'm not exactly sure how is your benchmark related to my problem. I think my problem is that the SyncReplicasOptimizer itself gives a significant overhead, and it is not the communication overhead. Anyway, it was a few months ago, so let me test it again with the recent version of TensorFlow as @tatatodd suggested.
